thread.title: Watch: The video game evolution of Nintendo’s beloved Mario
thread.title_full: Watch: The video game evolution of Nintendo’s beloved Mario - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Watch: The video game evolution of Nintendo’s beloved Mario
text: 30 years ago today, Super Mario Bros. was released for the NES in Japan and the world of video games would never be the same. Arguably the most iconic and influential video game ever released, Super Mario Bros. was the rare game that managed to transcend the world of video games. From movies and TV shows to action figures and even candy, it’s hard to think of a product or medium that wasn’t graced in some way by the title. Deservedly so, Super Mario Bros. was listed in the top spot in an IGN write-up of the top 100 video games of all-time.
